full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SPYOD PA LA 'JUG PA BZHUGS SO, ,
translator_(орчуулагч): DHARMA SHR'I BHA DRA, RIN CHEN BZANG PO, SH'AKYA BLO GROS,
editor_(хянан_тохиолдуулагч): SARBA DZNY'A DE BA, DPAL BRTZEGS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @057A *, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SPYOD PA LA 'JUG PA SLOB DPON SH'AN TA DE BAS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SARBA DZNY'A DE BA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZ'A BA BANDE DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS KHA CHE'I DPE LAS ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA LAS, SLAD KYIS RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO DHARMA SHR'I BHA DRA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZ'A BA BANDE RIN CHEN BZANG PO DANG, SH'AKYA BLO GROS KYIS YUL DBUS KYI 'GREL PA DANG, MTHUN PAR BCOS SHING BSGYUR TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,YANG DUS PHYIS RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SU MA TI KI RTI DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZ'A BA DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYIS DAG PAR BCOS SHING BSGYUR TE LEGS PAR GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,AOm SAm BHA RA SAm BHA RA BHI MA NA SA RA MAH'A DZA BA H'Um PHAt SV'A H'A, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA'I CHOS KYI TSIG GCIG GI DON GANG YIN DE NI CHOS THAMS CAD KYI YANG YIN NA, ,'ON KYANG, @057B BDAG NI RANG GI LAS KYI NYES PAS SHES RAB CHUNG ZHING BLO ZHAN TE, DE LTA YIN TU ZIN KYANG GANG BDAG GIS, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI GSUNG RAB GLEGS BAM DU BYAS PA BKLAG PAR BYA STE, ,CHOS KYI SGRA DE SEMS CAN GANG RNAMS KYI RNAL MA DU GRAG PAR GYUR BA DE DAG DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I SPOBS PA THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SANGS RGYAS BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO ZHVA SER BSTAN, ,'DZIN SKYONG SPEL LA KHUR 'KHYER SPOS KYI GLANG, ,BRGYA PHRAG DKA' YANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN 'DZIN, ,GNAM BSKOS BSTAN 'DZIN LHA DBANG CHOS RGYAL GYIS, ,BYANG CHUB SPYOD LA 'JUG PA'I DRI MED GSUNG, ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL PHYIR PAR DU BSGRUBS, ,DGE 'DIS MTSON PA'I RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS,  ,'JAM DPAL SNYING PO'I BSTAN PA DBYAR RNGA BZHIN, ,PHYOGS BCU KUN TU BAR MED SGROG PA DANG, ,KHYAD PAR TSE 'DAS TSE RING BKRA SHIS KYI, ,SGRIB GNYIS SBYANGS SHING TSOGS GNYIS RAB RDZOGS NAS, ,RNAM MKHYEN GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR SHOG , GO 'PHANG DAM PA MNGON DU GYUR NAS KYANG, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS KYI LAG PA RING BRKYANGS NAS, ,'GRO KUN RNAM MKHYEN 'THOB BYED 'PHAGS NOR BDUN, ,'DZAD PA MED PAR LONGS SU SPYOD PAR SHOG , ,,@058A *, ,DE LTAR BSKRUN PA'I MTHU LAS BYUNG BA YIS, ,'GRO LA BDE STZOL STOBS LDAN CHOS RGYAL GYI, ,CHAB SRID MNGA' THANG DBYAR GYI CHU GTER LTAR, ,RAB TU 'PHEL ZHING KUN TU RGYAS PA RU, ,BSKAL BRGYA'I BAR DU GNAS PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,YON TAN KUN GYI GZHI GYUR BLA MA DANG, ,MCHOG MTHUN DNGOS GRUB STZOL BA'I YI DAM LHA, ,BGEGS DPUNG MA LUS 'JOMS MDZAD SRUNGS TSOGS KYI, ,BSAM DON MYUR DU 'GRUB PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG , ,,(SPYOD 'JUG GI PAR BYANG,) GSUNG RAB KUN GYI SNYING PO'I CHU KLUNG 'BUM, ,NYAMS LEN GDAMS PAR RAB 'KHYIL RGYAL MTSO CHE, ,BYANG CHUB SPYOD PAR 'JUG PA'I GRU RDZINGS PAR, ,BSKRUN PA'I DGE RTZA KUNDA LTAR DKAR BAS, ,LUN RTOGS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA MI NYAMS SHING, ,BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN RGYAL SRAS SPYOD PA MCHOG , ,,ZUNG 'BREL NYAMS LEN GNAD RNAMS MTHAR PHYIN NAS, ,SANGS RGYAS GO 'PHANG BDE BLAG 'THOB PAR SHOG , ,,(CES PA 'DI NI AER TE NI THU SHE YE THU DAR RGAN NANG SO YE SHES SKAL BZANG GIS KHAL KHA PHYOGS SU SPYOD 'JUG GI PAR BYANG RE DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
